title: Stop What You’re Doing And Listen To This Doctor (Ep 1626)
description:
I interviewed a doctor on my radio show yesterday and it changed everything. I was floored by what he said. In this episode I address the interview. I also discuss the Biden Trojan Horse plan to “solve” the supply crisis. 

News Picks:

Is inflation about to explode? 

Studies say the Biden tax hikes will crush the recovery. 

Were some of the world’s deadliest viruses shipped to China?


Leaked Border Patrol documents show massive numbers of illegal immigrants released into the United States. 


Katie Couric edits an interview with the late RBG in order to “protect her.”
